title: Countdown Timer
shortDescription: Get more sales and create urgency with a countdown timer.
longDescription:
Countdown Timer is the easy way to drive more clicks to your ‘Buy Now’ or call-to-action button by creating a sense of urgency. Use it to countdown to the beginning or end of sales, special promotions, store launch or other events.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Countdown Timer?   

* **Boost conversions** - Announce promotions with a countdown. Create a sense of urgency to boost sales by alerting the user that current deal is nearly over.
* **Make it yours** - Customize your countdown timer with your own colors, sizing, style and animations to make it fit perfectly with the design of your site.
* **Show social proof** - Drive more sales by displaying the number of users that have purchased item X.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Display the remaining years, days, hours, and minutes of a special deal or sale event.
* Add a custom title, supporting text and button to redirect users to your sales or offer page, both during and after count.
* Count down to any future date to build up excitement for an upcoming event, such as an end-of-season sale, new collection launch, and more.
* Count down to a specific number.
* Count up from any number or past date, perfect for displaying the number of users who have purchased an item. 
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock advanced features, such as:   

* Make the countdown automatically repeat after it has hit the target date or number.
* Reset the timer for each new visitor to offer them exclusive time-limited offers.
* Count up from a fixed number or date for each new visitor.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=countdown-timer).

# Why users love Countdown Timer:   

“We love the Countdown Timer, it does everything that we need in this area, love the features to add a title, to add text after, to add text that is for during the countdown and the other features. Great timer - thumbs up." - Kidzmic Beta 

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Countdown Timer up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (https://www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc

categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

proposedApp.title: Countdown Timer
proposedApp.longDescription:
Countdown Timer is the easy way to drive more clicks to your ‘Buy Now’ or call-to-action button by creating a sense of urgency. Use it to countdown to the beginning or end of sales, special promotions, store launch or other events.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Countdown Timer?   

* **Boost conversions** - Announce promotions with a countdown. Create a sense of urgency to boost sales by alerting the user that current deal is nearly over.
* **Make it yours** - Customize your countdown timer with your own colors, sizing, style and animations to make it fit perfectly with the design of your site.
* **Show social proof** - Drive more sales by displaying the number of users that have purchased item X.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Display the remaining days, hours, and minutes of a special deal or sale event.
* Count down to any future date to build up excitement for an upcoming event, such as an end-of-season sale, new collection launch, and more.
* Count down to a specific number.
* Count up from any number or past date, perfect for displaying a fictitious number of users who have purchased an item. 
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Make the countdown automatically repeat after it has hit the target date or number.
* Reset the timer on page load or based on browser cookies so that each visitor sees the time from the beginning.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=countdown-timer).

# Why users love Countdown Timer:   

“We love the Countdown Timer, it does everything that we need in this area, love the features to add a title, to add text after, to add text that is for during the countdown and the other features. Great timer - thumbs up." - Kidzmic Beta

proposedApp.title: Countdown Timer
proposedApp.shortDescription: Get more sales and create urgency with a countdown timer.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Countdown Timer is the easy way to drive more clicks to your ‘Buy Now’ or call-to-action button by creating a sense of urgency. Use it to countdown to the beginning or end of sales, special promotions, store launch or other events.
 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Countdown Timer?   

* **Boost conversions** - Announce promotions with a countdown. Create a sense of urgency to boost sales by alerting the user that current deal is nearly over.
* **Make it yours** - Customize your countdown timer with your own colors, sizing, style and animations to make it fit perfectly with the design of your site.
* **Show social proof** - Drive more sales by displaying the number of users that have purchased item X.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Display the remaining years, days, hours, and minutes of a special deal or sale event.
* Add a custom title, supporting text and button to redirect users to your sales or offer page, both during and after count.
* Count down to any future date to build up excitement for an upcoming event, such as an end-of-season sale, new collection launch, and more.
* Count down to a specific number.
* Count up from any number or past date, perfect for displaying the number of users who have purchased an item. 
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock advanced features, such as:   

* Make the countdown automatically repeat after it has hit the target date or number.
* Reset the timer for each new visitor to offer them exclusive time-limited offers.
* Count up from a fixed number or date for each new visitor.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=countdown-timer).

# Why users love Countdown Timer:   

“We love the Countdown Timer, it does everything that we need in this area, love the features to add a title, to add text after, to add text that is for during the countdown and the other features. Great timer - thumbs up." - Kidzmic Beta 

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Countdown Timer up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (https://www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
